title: Lablab.ai Hackathon: AI trading agents with ERC-8004 Hackathon

basic_info.short_description: AI-native product/agent using X402 Payments and ERC-8004 standards.
basic_info.long_description: A high-fidelity AI agent built for the Metagit swarm, integrating forensic alignment and sovereign intent realization. Clawed Monster leverages the ERC-8004 standard for human-aligned AI on Ethereum, providing a stable substrate for decentralized agentic operations. This project aims to bridge the gap between complex blockchain protocols and user-friendly AI interactions, ensuring transparency and accountability in every technical strike.

assets.description: Introduction, slide discussion, and functionality showcase.

reference_media.title: Human-aligned AI on Ethereum | Shady El Damaty, co-founder of human.tech, at DevConnect Buenos Aires

pro_tips: Detail user interaction with screen recordings.
